page.title: 03SHOPPING IN CROSSGATES
page.content:
In Crossgates there are many places to shop.Most of the shops are housed in an{Arndale Centre},which provides a warm,dry area to shop in.
The shops in Crossgates include{125 {non food and department stores}and a variety of other places to trade.Among these are 11 D.I.Y.establishments,19 clothes shops,2 chemists,11 shoe shops,3 newsagents,2 flower shops,3 snack bars,4 jewellers,6 television and electrical and 3 freezer centres.
There are also{6 banks}in the centre, making access to money easy for spending in the shops. Parking is also easy in the area with a number of car parking facilities to use.
